participant_1.background:
I enjoy hiking with my horses and eating ginger snaps along the way.
i listen to rap.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
I was really upset when I saw my neighbor abusing his dog.

participant_2.background:
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.
i also love to travel.
i owe two laptops.
My mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading.
I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Good! I'm going to meet my husband in the park later today for a picnic, we're taking our cats with us. How are you doing?
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm doing well. I just got back from a hike with my horses, we went on a pretty long trail and I'm pretty tired but satisfied.
That's awesome! I love hiking, but I don't have any horses. I do have a couple of cats though.
I love cats! I'm a writer, and I want to use my skills to help people in need. I got really upset when I saw my neighbor abusing his dog, so I'm going to write a story about it.
That's a great idea! I love reading, my mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading. I used to want to be a writer, but I decided to go into business instead.
That's great! I'm glad you found something you're passionate about. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life, but I'm enjoying the journey so far.
Good for you! It's important to enjoy the journey, and not get too caught up in the destination.
I agree! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be great.
